text: Alexander Sergeyevich Foliforov (; born 8 March 1992) is a Russian professional racing cyclist, who last rode for UCI Professional Continental team . He was named in the start list for the 2016 Giro d'Italia, winning the individual time trial on Stage 15. ==Major results== ;2012 : 6th Overall Tour de Serbie ::1st Young rider classification : 10th Overall Toscana-Terra di Ciclismo ;2013 : 1st Stage 4 Grand Prix of Adygeya : 5th Road race, UEC European Under-23 Road Championships : 5th Overall Giro della Valle d'Aosta : 7th Trofeo Banca Popolare di Vicenza ;2014 : 1st Stage 4 Grand Prix of Adygeya : 2nd Trofeo PIVA : 4th Overall Tour de l'Avenir : 6th Overall Ronde de l'Isard ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st 20px Mountains classification ::1st Stages 1 & 4 ;2015 : 1st 20px Overall Grand Prix of Sochi ::1st Stage 4 (ITT) : 2nd Grand Prix of Sochi Mayor : 10th Overall Tour of Slovenia ;2016 : 1st Stage 15 (ITT) Giro d'Italia ;2017 : 1st 20px Mountains classification Tour of the Alps ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2016 ! scope="col" | 2017 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia | style="text-align:center;"|45 | style="text- align:center;"|40 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |— |— |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male cyclists Category:People from Kovrov Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Russian Giro d'Italia stage winners
